gadget.gadget: $$22565$$AOM FINDS YOUR TEAMMATES AND OPPONENTS - Select your settings (#players, your god, map type etc.) and press the "Start" button.
$$22566$$YOU CREATE YOUR TEAM, AOM FINDS AN OPPOSING TEAM - Create your own team using the "Create Team" and "Invite Friends" button. AOM then selects appropriate opponents and the game begins.
$$24160$$**Games against the AI are not rated.
$$22568$$JOIN A GAME ON THE GAMES LIST - Select a game on the list and press the "Join" button.

$$22569$$HOST A GAME TO THE GAMES LIST - Press the "Host" button from teh Games List screen and set your game settings. People can now join your game from the Games List. You can also use the "Invite Friends" button to populate this game.

$$22570$$HOST A PRIVATE GAME - To host an invitation-only game that you do not want added to the Games List screen, press the "Host" button and check the "Private" box. You must use the "Invite Friends" button to populate your game.

mpsetupcustom-Handicap
gadget.mouseovertext: $$20033$$Choose the level of handicapping for the game. Free allows each player to set an ecomonic percentage bonus for themselves with a value from 0-500. Fair, an option in ESO, compares the ratings of each player to determine an appropriate handicap.

gadget.name: mpsetupcustom-game name-text
gadget.mouseovertext: $$22024$$This is the name of the game.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-SelfRate
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24077$$Self Rating adjusts the rating used for matchmaking.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-SelfRate-MatchAdjLabel
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24157$$Rating Adjustment. In your first 10 games this adjustment is applied to your rating when searching for a game. This adjustment decreases with each game you play.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-SelfRate-MatchAdj
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24157$$Rating Adjustment. In your first 10 games this adjustment is applied to your rating when searching for a game. This adjustment decreases with each game you play.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-SelfRate-GamesLeftLabel
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24158$$This is the number of games left until self rating is no longer available.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-SelfRate-GamesLeft
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24158$$This is the number of games left until self rating is no longer available.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-PlayerRating
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24174$$Rating is a number based on an ELO style algorithm based on your rated game wins and loses.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-RatedWinsRollover
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24176$$Rated Wins is the total number of rated games that you have won.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-RatedGamesRollover
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24175$$Rated Games is the number of rated games played. Only rated games affect your rating.

gadget.name: MPQuickLaunch-GamesWon
gadget.mouseovertext: $$24176$$Rated Wins is the total number of rated games that you have won.

gadget.name: friend-tab-FriendsList-AddAFriend
gadget.gadget: $$20054$$Type your friend's online name in the field below and then hit the "Add Friend" button to add them to your list:
